name: cricket-nova-scotia
description: The front end web portal can be viewed by going to this [Link](​https://web.cs.dal.ca/~projectnsca/khurramaziz_cricketassociation/client/). We have retrieved a CS account from the CS helpdesk so we can use Bluenose to host the site, and database on. To connect to **bluenose.cs.dal.ca** you are able to SSH into the server using the following credentials: **username:** `projectnsca` and the ​**password**: `projectNSCA`​.
